sentences: Rurika Yokoyama (横山 ルリカ, Yokoyama Rurika, born September 27, 1991) is a Japanese talent and a member of the Japanese idol group Idoling!!!.
She is represented by the Production Ogi talent agency.
She was a member of the idol group "Doll's Vox" in 2005 with AKB48's Yuko Oshima, produced by The Alfee's Toshihiko Takamizawa.
member to release a solo single.
Kenka Banchou Gekijoban ~ Ichinen Sensou (2011) as Ayano Shiratori
